title: Buy groceries, milk and eggs
description: Purchase milk, bread, eggs, and vegetables. Make sure everything fits in the bag!

title: Finish homework (Java, Math)
description: Complete the Java assignment; check all methods, loops, and edge cases.

title: Clean the house
description: Living room, kitchen, and bathrooms. Don't forget to vacuum carpets, mop tiles, and wipe surfaces.

title: Prepare presentation "Weekly Report"
description: Create slides for the weekly meeting: charts, summary, and notes. Status intentionally wrong to test!
